longTitle.p: COUNCIL IMPLEMENTING REGULATION (EU) 2020/370of 5 March 2020implementing Regulation (EU) No 208/2014 concerning restrictive measures directed against certain persons, entities and bodies in view of the situation in Ukraine

formula.name: actingEntity
formula.p: THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION,

citation.p: Having regard to the Treaty on the Functioning of the European Union,

Having regard to Council Regulation (EU) No 208/2014 of 5 March 2014 concerning restrictive measures directed against certain persons, entities and bodies in view of the situation in Ukraine
OJ L 66, 6.3.2014, p. 1., and in particular Article 14(1) thereof,
Having regard to the proposal from the High Representative of the Union for Foreign Affairs and Security Policy,

recital.p: On 5 March 2014, the Council adopted Regulation (EU) No 208/2014.

On the basis of a review by the Council, the entries for two persons should be deleted and the information in Annex I regarding the rights of defence and the right to effective judicial protection should be updated.
Annex I to Regulation (EU) No 208/2014 should therefore be amended accordingly,

content.p: Annex I to Regulation (EU) No 208/2014 is amended as set out in the Annex to this Regulation.
This Regulation shall enter into force on the date of its publication in the Official Journal of the European Union.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
